text:
r anaemia if Hb low 
HIV counselling and testing x x x x x Check if retested, start ART if HIV positive 
HIV care and monitoring x x x x x Monitor viral load as per guidelines 
Previous visits concerns x x x x x x x Have these been resolved? 
Examine (Look, 
feel, listen) 
Pallor x x x x x Screen for anaemia, repeat Hb 30 & 38 weeks 
Blood pressure x x x x x x x Screen for hypertension 
Urine; protein/glucose x x x x x x x Screen for pre-eclampsia and diabetes 
Uterine growth (SFH) x x x x x Scr
